allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove hardcoded credentials from environment configuration

Replaced hardcoded admin credentials with placeholder values in both
.env.example and env.js default values:
- Changed ADMIN_EMAIL from hardcoded email to placeholder
- Changed ADMIN_PASSWORD from hardcoded password to placeholder

This improves security by removing actual credentials from version control
and encourages users to set their own credentials.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
